tweet: Leading crypto-exchange @krakenfx will run its own Chainlink node to broadcast Kraken spot prices on-chain. The #Chainlink node allows Kraken to both sign its data to prove its origin and supply its Oracle Rates to power a wide range of #DeFi applications.
